row.process:
:set &filter# = str_substitute(&UC4RB_UNIX_FILTER#, "'", "'\''") :set &filter# = str_cat("'", &filter#) :set &filter# = str_cat(&filter#, "'")
UNIX_STD=95 UNIX95= export UNIX_STD export UNIX95
echo "### begin ps output ###" :if &UC4RB_UNIX_FILTER# <> "" ps -A -o pid= -o args= | grep -- &filter# :else ps -A -o pid= -o args= :endif echo "### end ps output ###" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_UNIX.PRV.VARA.TEMP.GET_PROCESS_LIST_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :set &output# = 0
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*") :PROCESS &hnd# : set &line# = get_process_line(&hnd#) : if &line# = "### end ps output ###" : set &output# = 0 : endif : if &output# = 1 : set &temp# = str_ltrim(&line#) : set &pos# = str_find(&temp#, " ") : set &pid# = mid(&temp#, 1, &pos#) : set &pos# = add(&pos#, 1) : set &args# = mid(&temp#, &pos#) : if &UC4RB_OUT_PROC_ID# = "" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_PROC_ID# = &pid# : pset &UC4RB_OUT_PROC_ARGS# = &args# : endif : put_var &variableName#, &pid#, &args# : endif : if &line# = "### begin ps output ###" : set &output# = 1 : endif :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_PROCESS_LIST# = "&variableName#"
